metadata.Sensor: Landsat-5 MSS/TM (1990), Landsat-7 ETM (2000), SPOT-4/5 and IRS P6 LISS III (2006) and IRS P6 LISS III and RapIDEye (2012)
metadata.Classification Scheme: 1st level: 5 classes; 2nd level: 15 classes; 3th level: 44 classes
metadata.Accuracy: CLC 2000: Average accuracy of 74.8 %; CLC 2006: Not checked; Land Cover Change 2000-2006: overall accuracy of 87.82%
metadata.Use policy: Re-use of content on the EEA website for commercial or non-commercial purposes is permitted free of charge, provIDed that the source is acknowledged
